name: Redtube Video Downloader
tagline: Save Redtube videos instantly for offline viewing.
description:
Redtube Video Downloader captures scenes from redtube.com, regional sites, and embedded players, converting them into MP4 files you can watch offline. It detects every available resolution, handles HLS streams behind the page, and keeps downloads moving even when you minimise the tab.

Choose the quality you want, let the extension pull the stream segments, and it merges them in the background while you browse. The result is a clean MP4 saved locally with no ads, buffering, or tracking.

faqs.question: How do I download a Redtube video?
faqs.answer: Open the video, click the downloader icon, pick your preferred resolution, and let the progress bar finish. The MP4 saves to your downloads folder with the video title.

faqs.question: Does it work on embedded Redtube players?
faqs.answer: Yes. The extension detects embed.redtube.com players and operates exactly the same as it does on the main site.

faqs.question: Will it keep downloading if I reload the page?
faqs.answer: Progress persists even if you refresh or open a new tab. Just keep the original video tab open so the session stays active.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Versions are available for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops.

faqs.question: Does it capture captions or interactive overlays?
faqs.answer: The downloader focuses on video and audio. Captions, overlays, or interactive elements aren’t included in the MP4.

faqs.question: Is my activity private?
faqs.answer: All conversion happens locally, no analytics are collected, and the extension never sends your viewing history to external services.
